step_feedback.feedback: You did a good job sitting or standing comfortably. Try to keep your hands on your abdomen throughout the exercise.
You are placing your hands on your abdomen. Ensure you are inhaling slowly through your nose.
You are inhaling through your nose and tightening your muscles. Focus on visualizing fluid moving to your chest as you inhale.
You are exhaling through your mouth and relaxing your muscles. Visualize pushing fluid out as you exhale to maximize lymphatic flow.

exercise_summary: Great job with your deep breathing! Remember to inhale through your nose while tightening your body, and exhale through your mouth while relaxing. Keep visualizing the fluid movement to help your lymphatic system.
